event.title: The Founding
event.content: Open Lectures founders Linan Qiu and Zhang Yitao mooted the idea of making top quality education free and accessible to everyone. The rest, as they say, is history.

event.title: The Beta
event.content: After six months of planning and development, Open Lectures opens its doors to one hundred beta testers for a month of intensive product feedback and improvement.

event.title: The Launch
event.content: Three redesigns and a couple hundred hours of footage later, Open Lectures launches. New content rolls out every week, and the staff do not rest.

event.title: The News
event.content: News of Open Lectures is sent by mail to all Junior Colleges. Open Lectures is henceforth truly open.
